about_the_game:
You find yourself in the hotel, not knowing how you get there. The place seems empty, but only at the first glance...
Will you try to escape as soon as possible? Or try to figure out why you are here?

  • Solve multiple puzzles created by the fan of the escape rooms,
  • Find the clues about what happened and why are you here,
  • Explore multi floor hotel with variety of rooms,
  • Survive the horrors that exists there,
  • Experience disturbing scenes from nightmares created in pixel art,

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains scenes of violence and gore. Though made with pixel art, it can still feel disturbing.

name: Enlightened Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Enlightened is a survival horror game with strong focus on puzzle solving. Explore the hotel in which you woke up, find clues about what happened, solve puzzles and find a way out, while surviving horrors that awaits you there.
